page.description: A web API for interacting with TransForm from web applications.

discussion.p: All TransForm API access is over HTTPS and accessed from *[js:https://transform.alphasoftware.com/]*. All data is sent and received as JSON.
An API key is required to use the TransForm API and must be included in all calls to the TransForm API.
You can generate a TransForm API key in TransForm Central. See [Creating an API Key] to learn how.

description.p: To get an API Key for Alpha TransForm:
Click *[ui:Don't have a username/password?]* and create an account.

step.important: You must use a valid email address.

description.p: After you sign up, return to the login screen and Sign in.
After signing in, you'll see the Home tab. Click the *[ui:Get API Key]* menu option.
Create an API Key with the permissions you require. Use Ctrl-click to select the desired scope(s). Copy the key and store it in a secure place.

step.tip: Use *[ui:Revoke API Key]* to deactivate an API Key you no longer need.
